name: 237Builds
description: An online platform and community showcasing Cameroon's tech ecosystem, startups, and resources to foster growth and collaboration.

name: Freshbag
description: A digital marketplace and distribution platform connecting small-scale farmers to customers across Cameroon.

name: Aleigro Online Shopping Mall
description: Cameroonâ€™s first online shopping mall, aggregating products from multiple local merchants into one app for consumers.

name: Findie
description: A mobile app for University of Buea students to navigate campus and access important academic information and locations.

name: Concour Guide CMR
description: An educational app providing past entrance exam questions and career guidance to help Cameroonian students prepare for competitive exams.

name: Digolearn
description: An online learning platform offering virtual schooling tools, school management software, and an academic community for schools and students.

name: Quesers
description: An app where students access past exam questions and answers, and contributors can earn money by uploading authentic study materials.

name: Data Girl Technologies
description: A tech education initiative providing coding bootcamps, mentorship, and networking to empower young women and girls in Cameroon in STEM fields.

name: Ejara
description: A mobile investment platform enabling users to invest via their mobile money account in crypto and stocks, with interest-bearing savings plans.

name: PaySika
description: A neo-bank service operating through messaging platforms, offering free accounts and virtual cards with no fees or minimum balance requirements.

name: Nkwa
description: A licensed savings app helping users set and achieve financial goals with features like goal reminders and locked savings wallets for future needs.

name: Bohikor
description: A personal finance mobile app that teaches budgeting and expense tracking to salary earners, helping them manage and optimize their spending habits.

name: Swychr
description: A blockchain-powered mobile wallet enabling free, instant peer-to-peer money transfers worldwide, along with merchant and multicurrency features.

name: Waspito
description: A telemedicine app connecting patients with certified doctors for video consultations, digital prescriptions, and access to nearby labs and pharmacies.

name: Zitopay
description: An online payment gateway and marketplace simplifying payments for businesses of all sizes, enabling multi-channel transactions via web, WhatsApp, or SMS.

name: Fapshi
description: A payments infrastructure startup offering easy-to-integrate APIs, payment links, and pre-built checkout solutions for websites, apps, and events.

name: Campay
description: A mobile money gateway enabling Cameroonian businesses to accept MTN and Orange mobile money payments seamlessly, with fast payouts and flexible integration.

name: Traleor
description: A no-code website builder for African SMEs and entrepreneurs, allowing users to create and host fully optimized websites without any programming.

name: OnDjoss
description: A feature-rich messaging app built by Cameroonians, offering free chats, voice messages, group calls, file sharing, and unlimited cloud storage.

name: Taaply
description: A networking platform that lets users create and exchange digital business cards instantly via NFC, eliminating the need for paper cards.

name: Gozem
description: A regional on-demand super-app offering motorcycle and car rides, as well as food and grocery delivery, primarily serving West and Central African markets.

name: Agri Hub Technologies
description: An agri-tech company that bridges farmers with urban buyers, providing improved inputs, training, and farm management solutions to boost productivity.

name: AgricFresh
description: Develops solar-powered cold-storage units and an online marketplace to reduce post-harvest losses, improving shelf-life and direct farmer-to-buyer linkages.

name: AgrixTech
description: An AI-powered agritech platform that diagnoses crop diseases from photos and provides sustainable farming advice to help smallholder farmers increase yields.

name: Koree
description: A digital wallet app that collects users' spare change from purchases and offers cashback rewards, helping consumers save money effortlessly.

name: SMECreditPro
description: A financial services platform offering quick, unsecured business loans and financial products to help African SMEs access working capital rapidly.
